Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes tenant's rights to repair habitability-impairing conditions and receive offset cost against rent payments under certain conditions
Summary: Allows tenants in multiple dwellings and multiple residences to offset against rent the cost of repairing habitability-impairing conditions in such dwelling or residence; establishes conditions and procedures therefor.
LawCode: Add §305-b, Mult Res L; add §302-d, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple residence law and the multiple dwelling law, in relation to the correction of habitability-impairing conditions by the tenant
